Title: Establishes a pregnant persons' bill of rights
Summary: Establishes a pregnant persons' bill of rights; requires posting and disclosing such bill of rights; establishes a penalty for failure to post or disclose such bill of rights.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 6 ยง266-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a pregnant persons' bill of rights
